_header: Forty days after Christ was born was Candlemass Day
_description: ‘Purificacio beate marie’, in some MSS of the South English Legendary

BodRawPoe225.First Lines:
ffovrty dayes after crist was born was candelmesse daymarie dude
                    hir chirche gong as it fel in þe lay…
BodRawPoe225.Last Lines:
…& bryng vs to heuyn after our endyng dayþer sche
                    with hir bone is & schal ben ay
